casebody.data:
2002-1631 (La. 10/25/02)

Ronald Joseph AUTHEMENT v. SHAPPERT ENGINEERING AND ST. PAUL FIRE & MARINE INSURANCE COMPANY. No. 2002-C-1631. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Authement, Ronald Joseph;— Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review Office Of Workers’ Comp. Dist. 9, No. 99-09067; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 CA 0924.

Granted.
